import numpy as np

def score(item: int, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """The modified algorithm calculates the scores for the bins by taking the power of the inverse of the difference between the remaining capacity of each bin and the item size, squares each score, multiplies each score by the bin capacity, subtracts the minimum value across all bins from the obtained scores, adds the maximum value across all bins to the scores, and finally normalizes the scores by dividing them by the maximum score."""

    # Calculate the difference between the remaining capacity of each bin and the item size
    difference = bins - item

    # Take the inverse of the difference and raise it to the power of 2
    scores = np.power(1 / difference, 2)

    # Multiply each score by the bin capacity
    scores *= bins

    # Subtract the minimum value across all bins from the scores
    scores -= np.min(scores)

    # Add the maximum value across all bins to the scores
    scores += np.max(scores)

    # Normalize the scores by dividing them by the maximum score
    scores /= np.max(scores)

    return scores
